attributes.action: reform the system of MPs' expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs should be required to:

1. Provide receipts for all expenses claimed, regardless of the amount spent, in accordance with HMRC requirements.
2. To disclose, in full, all benefits in kind received during their term of office.
3. At the end of their term in office sell any second property bought at the public expense within a reasonable period of time, the proceeds of sale being returned to the taxpayer.
4. Standard job specifications should be created for all MPs' employees and only those members of an MPs family who meet specifications may be employed by an MP.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
